name: Candy Jewel Halloween Match 3
description:
****Jewel World Season is amazing Match 3 game with season event theme ****

Destroy all backgrounds to complete a level.
Try to challenge level bonus time or Play ZEN without time effect.

**** For all the family! ****

+Beautiful Easter image and music…
+Beautiful Halloween image and music…
+Beautiful Christmas image and music…
+Beautiful Summer image and music…
+Complete Chapter to receive a new Special Candy

+Try completing this saga! Easy to learn, hard to master!

****** Key features ******
10 FREE chapters with many beautifuls levels
Game Center and Leaderboard

Use special tools to help you to complete level or unlock grid in no more moves!
Many FREE tools + buy more (In-Apps)
